name: Relics of Deldroneye 1.5: Return to Zantis
description:
Return to Zantis is a point & click adventure game featuring Venturex Falcon in an installment of the Relics of Deldroneye sci-fi/fantasy saga. In this game Falcon has business to take care of in Zantis, a place he is already familiar with from previous adventures. He has been summoned by the shadowy Spam Syndicate, a group that helped Falcon in the past, and now requires his help. Your first task is to locate a representative of the Spam Syndicate somewhere in town, and find out what they want.

The interface splits the screen vertically: the current scene is displayed in third-person perspective above an action panel that includes ten verb action buttons ("Move", "Look", "Take", "Use", "Talk", "Offer", "Open", "Close", "Give" and "Show") and a display of the inventory items that Falcon is carrying. Falcon's fists and feet are included as permanent inventory, to be used with items or characters in order to physically attack them.

shot.caption: Reading a sign pinned to a building covered in graffiti
